title: Flirting: The Tao Books of Flirting, Teasing and Temptation
description: Flirting by Alexia Bennett Want to know how to flirt to win? Looking to attract that special person into your life? Your arms? Your bedroom? andThe keys to flirting are easy to understand and only slightly harder to master. Flirting does not have to be complicated, that is unless you need drama to spice up your love life. If you like the idea of gentle teasing and temptation then pick up a copy of this book - and keep it simple. This no-nonsense guide will empower you. Before you know it, you'll be enjoying your romantic relationships more and finding out what true temptation can really lead to. There are just a few simple rules when it comes to flirting. If you like life to be easy and as enjoyable as possible, choose a guide that's just that - easy and enjoyable. 1. Introduction 2. The Basics of Flirting 3. The Importance of Self-Confidence 4. Where to Find Your Love 5. First Impressions 6. How to Build Rapport 7. Body Language Tips 8. Understanding the Flirting Language 9. How to Make the Next Move 10. Dating & Relationship Tips Are you worried that you're not successful at dating? Is this affecting your mental health psychology? Flirting is not rocket science. Get the basics right and you'll get what you want in your love-life. Let Alexia Bennett, the author of the Amazon book Seduction be your guide.
author: Alexia Bennett
